title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Behavioral Skills Training to Support Mental Health of Nursing Home Residents

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational psychology and geriatric care knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify signs of mental illness in nursing home residents with 80% accuracy
Students can apply three or more appropriate behavioral intervention techniques in mental health-related situations.
Students can develop and implement comprehensive support plans for real-world cases through PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
